articles.title: Pakistan court overturns death penalty for ex-president
articles.description: A Pakistani court has overturned the death sentence given to the country's ex-military ruler, Pervez Musharraf, a former close U.S. ally in the war against terror
articles.content:
LAHORE, Pakistan -- 
A Pakistani court on Monday overturned the death sentence given to the country's ex-military ruler, Pervez Musharraf, a former close U.S. ally in the war against terror.

articles.title: Body camera video records moment officer is hit by a train
articles.description: Police in Georgia have released body camera video showing the moment an officer was hit by a train while on duty
articles.content:

articles.content:
